
# PayZen 
![payzen](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/payzen/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `payzen` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] PayZen 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Created in 2001, Lyra Network secures transactions  from proximity  payment ,internet and mPOS all over the world (Electronic Payment Terminal and payment servers). Recognised for its reliability and its security, Lyra Network is constantly innovating to provide high quality services to its customers. Since 2011,Lyra Network has used its skills and experience to develop an effective payment solution : PayZen More than 25 000 e-merchants  and 7 acquirers in white brand trust on our  online payment Gateway in France and it's now available in all Europe, Brasil and India. Security: PCI DSS 2.0 , Visa merchant agent, GIE CB  
 
 
**Countries:**
